sentences.en: The Auto Pact yoked Ontario into the United States economy.
sentences.cn: 《汽车协定》强行将安大略纳入了美国经济体。

sentences.en: Striking workers halted production at the auto plant yesterday.
sentences.cn: 昨天，汽车厂的罢工工人完全停止了生产。

sentences.en: Over the last decade, auto theft has increased by over 56 percent.
sentences.cn: 过去的10年来汽车盗窃案上升了56％以上。
